cab.content: VV-____ -llEH ALL ^C V V12l/Press/717,WAR CABINET Lord Erench and "John Bull".Note by the Secretary of State for War. .With reference to War Cabinet 169 (l), I haveobtained an opinion from the Law'Officers-which is in thefollowing terms:- "Both the Law Officers are clearly of opinionthat proceedings herein are inadvisable and would be quitelikely to fail". ... - 'DERBY.5th July, 1917.
